name: ERSATZ (itch) (BorderDestroyerGames)
description:
This is a game that I created for Brackey's Game Jam 2022.1 which took place over a week. The theme for it was "IT IS NOT REAL". On top of it being made in a week this is also the third game I've put out and the second GameJam I've participated in, so that's fun!

BY THE WAY:

There are very slight jumpscares in the game so do be warned about that.
